text: <@UNNQ7BQT0> Language all depends on what you want to do.  Web stuff certainly requires some JavaScript.  The data-centric stuff these days is mostly Python – and though superficially different with a lot of silly minutia and lore – these and a great many other languages: Ruby, Lua, Swift, Java, C even, end up being fairly similar in how they work.  So the principles of one are liable to apply to the others even when specifics don't.

elements.text: Language all depends on what you want to do.  Web stuff certainly requires some JavaScript.  The data-centric stuff these days is mostly Python – and though superficially different with a lot of silly minutia and lore – these and a great many other languages: Ruby, Lua, Swift, Java, C even, end up being fairly similar in how they work.  So the principles of one are liable to apply to the others even when specifics don't.
